summary: A stack overflow error occurs when gathering forwarded logs from the core worker on shutdown, caused by conflicting `takeWhile` and `repeat` operators in the log collection logic.
userImpact: Users see warning messages about failure to gather logs during worker shutdown, indicating incomplete log collection during graceful termination.
rootCause: Conflicting `takeWhile` and `repeat` reactive operators causing infinite recursion in the log forwarding stream
keyQuote: Error gathering forwarded logs from core RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded
